ComicInfo.Summary:
"BLOOD DEBT" continues, from FRED VAN LENTE (DIE!namite) and VINCENZO FEDERICI (Army Of Darkness). Anyone that knows Jennifer Blood, knows that her life's passion is to kill mobsters. So now that she's teamed up with ANOTHER mob assassin, who ALSO only wants to make mobsters suffer... well, too good to be true. (Spoiler...it is actually too good to be true.)
